amendment.description: An amendment numbered 4 printed in Part A of House Report 117-74 to strike Titles I, III, and V of the bill.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to strike Titles I, III, and V of the bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Comer amendment (A003) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 182 - 220 (Roll no. 194).

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A003) pursuant to the rule.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Comer.
Amendment failed by House: On agreeing to the Comer amendment (A003) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 182 - 220 (Roll no. 194).
